item.title: EU Parliament Member Seeks €1 Million for Blockchain Research - CoinDesk
item.description:
EU Parliament Member Seeks €1 Million for Blockchain Research - CoinDesk

A member of the European Parliament is proposing that €1m ($1.1m) be spent on a task force that would focus on studying digital currencies and blockchain technology. The push for funding comes months after the legislative arm of the European Union (EU) first approved the task force, proposed by MEP Jakob von Weizsäcker earlier this year.

item.title: Octopocket: Where Bitcoin Meets Telegram
item.description:
Octopocket: Where Bitcoin Meets Telegram

The Octopocket team are members of a Bitcoin Association in Spain called avalbit.org. They love bitcoin and do monthly meetups to introduce people to blockchain technology. The project believes that practice is more important than theory, and they want to make their platform as simple to use - and access - as possible.

item.title: What We Learned About Technocratic Fallacies From DAO Collapse
item.description:
What We Learned About Technocratic Fallacies From DAO Collapse

The DAO, the first leaderless investment fund which operates on code for reaching consensus in decision-making, is championing for the supremacy of the "immutable, incorruptible" code to be freed from the common fallacies of human behavior such as cognitive bias and irrationality.

item.title: Spells of Genesis Soft Launch Scheduled For Mid September 2016
item.description:
Spells of Genesis Soft Launch Scheduled For Mid September 2016

A new update regarding the ever popular blockchain-based Spells of Genesis game has been posted by the developers. Ever since the success crowdfunding campaign, the game has been in constant development. For now, the game is still in closed beta, but that situation will come to change shortly.

item.title: 'Settlement Coin' is All About Banks, Not Blockchain - CoinDesk
item.description:
'Settlement Coin' is All About Banks, Not Blockchain - CoinDesk

Why would anyone want to use a coin issued by four large banks bailed out in 2008? That's a question that many are asking after UBS, Deutsche Bank, Santander, BNY Mellon and ICAP announced last week that they had teamed up with the blockchain developer Clearmatics to create a new digital currency.

item.title: IPC & Post-Quantum Will Fuse Blockchain & Cloud Technologies
item.description:
IPC & Post-Quantum Will Fuse Blockchain & Cloud Technologies

New Jersey-based IPC Systems has partnered with Post-Quantum Solutions to implement biometrics, encryption and blockchain technologies into its Connexus Cloud network. Also read: Private Internet Access VPN Adds Roger Ver to Advisory Board IPC currently specializes in trading turret products and multi-speaker communications devices.

item.title: Bitcoin 0.13.0 May Change Bitcoin Forever
item.description:
Bitcoin 0.13.0 May Change Bitcoin Forever

Remember Windows Vista? The new Coke? An upgrade is not always a good thing until it is a good thing. Yet, without making changes and testing, things will never improve. Bitcoin Core is also going to be upgraded and hopefully things will be better for the cryptocurrency after it comes out.

item.title: Shopawl Introduces Option To Buy eBay Goods With Bitcoin
item.description:
Shopawl Introduces Option To Buy eBay Goods With Bitcoin

Not too long ago, we mentioned the ShopAwl service, which lets Bitcoin users shop around on the web. The company has expanded their offering, and will now accept eBay purchases as well. By using the service, any bitcoin user can buy goods from eBay in exchange for Bitcoin.

item.title: Blockchain Startup Symbiont Adds Ex-Morgan Stanley Director - CoinDesk
item.description:
Blockchain Startup Symbiont Adds Ex-Morgan Stanley Director - CoinDesk

Former Morgan Stanley managing director Caitlin Long has joined blockchain startup Symbiont as president and chairman of the board. The New York-based blockchain firm, which is seeking to advance capital markets blockchain applications in syndicated loans and OTC derivatives, announced the hiring today.

item.title: Dash Across America: John Bush Jackalope Speech on Freedom Cells and Self Improvement
item.description:
Dash Across America: John Bush Jackalope Speech on Freedom Cells and Self Improvement

In this Dash Across America update, we hear a speech John Bush gave at Jackalope Freedom Festival on Freedom Cells and Self Improvement. Freedom Cells are peer to peer mutual aid groups where members work together to secure their sovereignty. John spends the latter part of the speech talking about the role self improvement plays in creating better world.
